page.title: 02BROWN AND HUNT COMPANY
page.content: This farm keeps pigs and also makes fencing.Mr Brown owns the farm and he takes care of all the pigs.Mr Hunt makes all the fencing on the farm.The fencing is made with long strips of wood.First of all Mr Hunt put 5 strips of wood on a bench with 4 planks round the outside.He got a big hammer/drill which nailed all the wood together.The drill made a clanking noise.The wood came from Portugal.It was chestnut wood and when it was finished it was dipped into a 7foot tank of varnish. This gave it a deep brown appearance.
